title: Play a game
body: I want to play LOL, but the problem is, I download the game and I open it. It just shows the League of Legends logo and that's it. It won't turn on. And if I click on it wice it gives me an option to wait for the program to respond or to close. It never turns on. I f anyone knows a solution to this, PLEASE write it to me. I really want to play this game. Thank you!!{{champion:53}}

replies.body:
This is often caused by League not having proper permissions to run. There are a few things that could cause this, so I recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to address the common solutions.

Let me know if this helped!
